name: Space Math
description:
Space Math is an educational arcade game for multiple systems.

The year is 2500, and the evil robots known as Zorlyns, led by Zorlyn One are attacking Earth. As Moonbase Commander, you must protect Earth by firing Binary Bombs at the Zorlyns.

The player must answer addition, subtract, multiplication, and division questions. Each correct answer gives the player a Binary Bomb. The player then moves a crosshair to fire on and destroy the incoming Zorlyn vessel. Eventually, Zorlyn One will approach, and if destroyed, the player is victorious.
